Reviews.Title: Backup power adapters
Reviews.Author: E. Cady
Reviews.Content: Bought these unit because I had lost the use of another power adaptor on one of my security cameras after only 40 minutes of testing.  I am not surprised with this since these adaptor are made in mass quantities in China with poor QE/QA involvement.  Have used these before and have yet to incur a failure.

Reviews.Title: Priced right
Reviews.Author: MTDJ
Reviews.Content: As advertised works fine and when the wire starts to go, throw it away.  they are small and have an led light to let you know they are powered up.

Reviews.Title: Review
Reviews.Author: Bobby
Reviews.Content: Perfect service what every person aspecting on Internet commerce. Keep up good service and ship what you display on site.

Reviews.Title: Powers 1-meter LED Strip Light with no problem
Reviews.Author: Steve Johnson
Reviews.Content: Rather than spend big bucks for a commercial power supply, I bought a number of these to power LED strip lights I used to replace under-cabinet fluorescent bulbs in the old fixtures.  These were thin enough to fit into the fixtures, had plenty of power for the LED strips, warm up quickly, and since they're switching, they're very energy efficient.

ProductInfo.Features:
Output voltage 12V, output current 0.5A
Center positive 2.1 mm jack
Fully Regulated 100V-240V can be used world wide
6 feet long cord
Package included: 4 x 12V DC 500mA power supplies
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 4 Pack 100V-240V AC to 12V DC 500mA Switching Power Supplies Adapters for Security Camera CCTV DVR Surveillance System A83
